sections.heading: License to Read Grants. The State Librarian may award grants that develop, expand, or support the acquisition of and access to e-books and e-audiobooks in Illinois
sections.text: License to Read Grants. The State Librarian may award grants that develop, expand, or support the acquisition of and access to e-books and e-audiobooks in Illinois.

sections.heading: Fees and donations; License to Read Fund
sections.text:

The moneys in the Fund may be expended as provided in this Act.

sections.text: Assistance. To implement any part of this Act, the State Librarian may request any State agency, department, division, board, bureau, commission, or other entity or person to provide any services, assistance, or data that will enable the Office of the State Librarian to properly carry out the State Librarian's functions, powers, and duties under this Act. Those entities are authorized to provide any services, assistance, and data that will enable the State Librarian to properly carry out its functions, powers, and duties under this Act.

sections.heading: Rules. The Office of the Secretary of State may adopt rules necessary for implementation of this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
